title: Conscriptor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Conscript a non-player in the server to join the current game. They do not get a choice.
- Conscript someone not currently in the server to join the current game. They actually get a choice this time, and you are not refunded your charge if they say no. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this rolls, everyone in the server is to have their spectator role removed.
- When conscripting a player, the host will notify them that they have been conscripted. Then, they will join the game and receive a random role. An :randomFaction: Any slot will be added to the rolelist.
- Conscripted players have the option to not do anything if they really don't wanna play.
- You can conscript players removed from the game (NOT DEAD PLAYERS, unless they were specifically removed). If something else were to readd them, such as Voidling, they will count as two players.
- When conscripting someone not in the server, the host will ask that person.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: Goal: Have your conscripts use at least 5 abilities total between all conscripts, and see at least one conscript win.
